# School (Building)
## Overview
**School**

**Create** 58 Goods, 5 Influence, 53 Labor (2,370 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Bell Tower (Room)|Bell Tower]], 2 [[Classroom (Room)|Classrooms]], 1 [[19a - Common Room|Common Room]],

1 [[Courtyard (Room)|Courtyard]], 1 [[Kitchen (Room)|Kitchen]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 2 [[Storage (Room)|Storages]], 1 [[Workstation (Room)|Workstation]]

A place for educating children and young adults.
